contentrichtext.text: [[File:UMFG, Grindavík.gif|220px|right]] '''Ungmennafélag Grindavíkur''' (UMFG), simply known as ''Grindavík'', is a sport club in [[Grindavík]], [[Iceland]]. There are six divisions: [[Football (soccer)|Football]] ([[Knattspyrnudeild UMFG]]), [[Basketball]], [[Judo]], [[Swimming (sport)]], [[Taekwondo]], [[Gymnastic]]. ==Trophies and achievements== ===Basketball=== *'''[[Premier league men|Icelandic Premier League]]: 1''': **1995-96, 2011-12 ==External links== *{{is icon}} [http://www.umfg.is/ Official site] *[http://www.eurobasket.com/team.asp?Cntry=ISL&Team=608 EUROBasket: UMF Grindavík basketball team] *{{is icon}} [http://www.kki.is/widgets_team.asp?league_id=190&season_id=11953&team_id=1728 KKÍ: Grindavík - kki.is] {{DEFAULTSORT:Grindavikur}} [[Category:Basketball teams in Iceland]] {{Iceland-footyclub-stub}} {{Europe-basketball-team-stub}} [[de:Ungmennafélag Grindavíkur]] [[fr:UG Grindavík]] [[is:Ungmennafélag Grindavíkur]] [[lt:UMF Grindavík]] [[nl:UMF Grindavík]] [[sv:Ungmennafélag Grindavíkur]]
